Create final-to-useful efficiency vectors (eta_fu) and exergy-to-energy ratio vectors (phi_u) from a final-to-useful efficiency table

form_eta_fu_phi_u_vecs.Rd

Create final-to-useful efficiency vectors (eta_fu) and exergy-to-energy ratio vectors (phi_u) from a final-to-useful efficiency table

form_eta_fu_phi_u_vecs(
  .eta_fu_table,
  unit = IEATools::iea_cols$unit,
  year = IEATools::iea_cols$year,
  quantity = IEATools::template_cols$quantity,
  machine = IEATools::template_cols$machine,
  eu_product = IEATools::template_cols$eu_product,
  e_dot_machine = IEATools::template_cols$e_dot_machine,
  e_dot_machine_perc = IEATools::template_cols$e_dot_machine_perc,
  maximum_values = IEATools::template_cols$maximum_values,
  eta_fu = IEATools::template_cols$eta_fu,
  phi_u = IEATools::template_cols$phi_u,
  matnames = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$matnames,
  matvals = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$matvals,
  rownames = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$rownames,
  colnames = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$colnames,
  rowtypes = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$rowtypes,
  coltypes = IEATools::mat_meta_cols$coltypes,
  sep = " -> "
)

Arguments

.eta_fu_table

a final-to-useful efficiency table read by load_eta_fu_allocation_data(). A template for this table should have been created by eta_fu_table() and write_eta_fu_table().
unit, year

See IEATools::iea_cols.
quantity, machine, eu_product, e_dot_machine, e_dot_machine_perc, maximum_values, eta_fu, phi_u

See IEATools::template_cols.
matnames, matvals, rownames, colnames, rowtypes, coltypes

See IEATools::mat_meta_cols.
sep

The string separator between prefix and suffix of compound row and column names. Default is " -> ". The default value matches the default value for the sep argument of matsbyname::vectorize_byname(), because matsbyname::vectorize_byname() will be used for further manipulations.

Value

a tidy data frame with metadata columns (and year) along with matnames and matvals columns indicating and containing eta_fu and phi_u vectors, respectively.

Examples

load_eta_fu_data() %>%
  form_eta_fu_phi_u_vecs()
#>   Country Method Energy.type Last.stage matnames Year
#> 1     GHA    PCM           E      Final   eta.fu 1971
